description: Designs, develops, tests, and maintains the core software, services, and infrastructure.

positions.title: Software Engineer (Frontend)
positions.description: Designs and implements user-facing features and user interface components using web technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript/React).

positions.title: Software Engineer (Backend)
positions.description: Develops and manages the server-side logic, databases, and APIs that power the application.

positions.title: Full-Stack Developer
positions.description: Works across the entire technology stack, handling both frontend UI and backend infrastructure and services.

positions.title: DevOps Engineer
positions.description: Manages the automated build, deployment, and infrastructure processes (CI/CD) and maintains cloud resources.

positions.title: Site Reliability Engineer (SRE)
positions.description: Ensures the reliability, performance, and uptime of production systems, often through automation and tooling.

positions.title: Data Engineer
positions.description: Builds and maintains robust data pipelines, data warehouses, and ETL processes for data scientists and analysts.

positions.title: Security Engineer
positions.description: Protects systems and data from threats by implementing security protocols, monitoring, and penetration testing.

positions.title: Engineering Manager
positions.description: Leads a team of engineers, focusing on technical project delivery, strategic planning, and career development.

positions.title: VP of Engineering
positions.description: Oversees multiple engineering teams, sets organizational technical vision, and manages high-level staffing and budget.

description: Sets the strategy, roadmap, and requirements for a product or product line.

positions.title: Product Manager
positions.description: Defines product vision, strategy, and detailed requirements based on market needs, customer feedback, and business goals.

positions.title: Senior Product Manager
positions.description: Manages complex product areas or a portfolio of products, often mentoring junior PMs and driving significant P&L.

positions.title: Technical Product Manager
positions.description: Focuses on technical products or platform features, bridging the gap between engineering, product, and business stakeholders.

positions.title: Product Owner
positions.description: Manages the product backlog and prioritizes development work in Agile methodologies, acting as the voice of the customer.

positions.title: VP of Product
positions.description: Head of the entire product organization, responsible for overall product strategy, portfolio success, and market leadership.

description: Focuses on the user experience and visual interface of the product.

positions.title: UX Designer
positions.description: Focuses on optimizing the user experience by defining user flows, information architecture, wireframes, and prototypes.

positions.title: UI Designer
positions.description: Specializes in the visual and interactive elements of the product interface, ensuring aesthetic quality and brand consistency.

positions.title: Product Designer
positions.description: Handles both UX and UI, focusing on the end-to-end design process of a product or major feature.

positions.title: UX Researcher
positions.description: Conducts studies, interviews, and usability tests to gather data on user behavior and needs to inform design decisions.

positions.title: Design System Specialist
positions.description: Maintains and evolves the standardized library of reusable UI components, patterns, and guidelines for the organization.

positions.title: Head of Design
positions.description: Leads the design team, sets the design vision, and ensures consistent quality and experience across all products.

description: Analyzes large datasets to drive business decisions, improve products, and build predictive models.

positions.title: Data Scientist (ML/AI)
positions.description: Builds predictive models, develops machine learning algorithms, and derives complex insights from data to solve business problems.

positions.title: Business Intelligence (BI) Analyst
positions.description: Creates reports, dashboards, and visualizations to help business teams monitor performance, identify trends, and track KPIs.

positions.title: Quantitative Analyst
positions.description: Applies advanced mathematical and statistical methods to financial, risk, or optimization problems.

positions.title: Machine Learning Engineer
positions.description: Productionizes and maintains ML models, optimizing them for performance, scalability, and deployment in production systems.

positions.title: Analytics Manager
positions.description: Leads a team of analysts, manages data projects, and communicates complex insights and recommendations to executive leadership.

description: Manages client relationships, drives revenue growth, and forms strategic partnerships.

positions.title: Account Executive (AE)
positions.description: Responsible for closing sales deals, managing the full sales cycle, and achieving quarterly revenue targets.

positions.title: Sales Development Representative (SDR)
positions.description: Generates qualified leads through outbound efforts (cold calls, emails) and schedules meetings for the Account Executive team.

positions.title: Solutions Architect (Pre-Sales)
positions.description: Provides technical expertise, designs custom solutions, and demonstrates product capability to prospective customers to win sales.

positions.title: Partnerships Manager
positions.description: Identifies, negotiates, and manages strategic relationships and alliances with external companies to drive growth and integration.

positions.title: VP of Sales
positions.description: Leads the entire sales organization, setting global sales strategy, managing regional teams, and overseeing revenue operations.

description: Handles branding, content creation, campaigns, and public relations.

positions.title: Product Marketing Manager (PMM)
positions.description: Drives product adoption by defining market positioning, messaging, and executing the product's go-to-market strategy.

positions.title: Content Strategist
positions.description: Plans, creates, and manages written and visual content (blogs, whitepapers, guides) to attract and engage target audiences.

positions.title: SEO/SEM Specialist
positions.description: Optimizes web content for search engines (SEO) and manages paid search campaigns (SEM) to drive qualified traffic.

positions.title: Social Media Manager
positions.description: Manages the company's presence across social platforms, engaging the community, and running organic and paid campaigns.

positions.title: Public Relations Specialist
positions.description: Manages the company's public image, handles media inquiries, and secures positive coverage in major publications.

positions.title: Head of Marketing
positions.description: Oversees all marketing functions, branding, budgets, and team performance, reporting directly to the C-suite.

description: Ensures customer satisfaction, provides technical support, and manages customer retention.

positions.title: Customer Success Manager (CSM)
positions.description: Manages a portfolio of accounts, ensuring customers achieve value from the product to drive retention and expansion revenue.

positions.title: Technical Support Specialist (L1/L2)
positions.description: Provides first and second-line technical troubleshooting, resolving product issues, and assisting users with queries.

positions.title: Technical Account Manager (TAM)
positions.description: Acts as a dedicated technical liaison for high-value enterprise clients, proactively ensuring long-term technical success and integration.

positions.title: Training & Documentation Specialist
positions.description: Develops tutorials, user manuals, and knowledge base articles for customers and internal teams to facilitate product usage.

description: Manages talent acquisition, employee relations, office administration, and facilities.

positions.title: Recruiter / Talent Acquisition Specialist
positions.description: Sources, screens, and hires candidates for open roles, managing the end-to-end recruitment process.

positions.title: HR Business Partner (HRBP)
positions.description: Works directly with department leaders to manage employee relations, performance management, and organizational development.

positions.title: Compensation & Benefits Analyst
positions.description: Researches, designs, and administers competitive employee compensation, equity, and benefits programs.

positions.title: Workplace Operations Manager
positions.description: Oversees office facilities, vendor management, and ensures a smooth, safe, and productive daily work environment.

positions.title: Chief People Officer
positions.description: Executive-level role defining the company's overall talent strategy, culture, inclusion, and HR policy.

description: Manages company finances, accounting, compliance, and legal matters.

positions.title: Financial Analyst
positions.description: Performs budgeting, forecasting, and financial modeling to support business planning and strategic decision-making.

positions.title: Accountant
positions.description: Manages the general ledger, payroll, accounts payable/receivable, and prepares official financial statements.

positions.title: Internal Auditor
positions.description: Evaluates the effectiveness of internal controls and processes to ensure compliance with financial regulations and company policy.

positions.title: Corporate Counsel / Legal Counsel
positions.description: Provides legal advice on business operations, contracts, intellectual property, and manages litigation risk.

positions.title: VP of Finance
positions.description: Manages financial planning, analysis (FP&A), treasury functions, and reports financial performance to the executive team.
